editorialNotes.standard: Know the rules of poker? Get ready to break them in this brilliant roguelike deck-builder, which puts its own twist on the classic card game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Created by Ellen DeGeneres, this riotous game-night challenge reinvents charades for the app generation. Pick a category, then hold your device up to your head, screen facing outward, and guess the words using your friends’ clues. Several categories are included, with many more available as In-App Purchases. Best of all, you can record and share videos of your friends’ increasingly frantic efforts to clue you in. Heads Up! puts a fun, fast-paced party starter in your pocket.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Smartly positioning fighters in this roguelike deckbuilder helps the gameplay shine as brightly as the flame you’re tasked with defending.

Switch on the laser pointer! Scoop the litter! Rub the belly of the all-seeing Pig-a-Corn! This mobile version of the insanely irreverent card game brings the fatal felines to our devices, along with a few purr-fect new twists. The hysterical illustrations by Matthew Inman (creator of The Oatmeal) spring to life with animation and sound—and a meter that tracks the chance of drawing an exploding kitten makes the game even more hilariously tense. Played face-to-face with friends or online against strangers, it’s surprisingly strategic and cat-astrophically fun.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Play the german card game Skat
Discover an RPG built of cards

editorialNotes.standard: Every swipe through this fascinating card-based fantasy puts you on a new path. Uncover power-ups, fight hidden enemies, and last as long as you can!

Merge numbers to create bigger numbers and repeat to avoid gridlock. The formula may be straightforward, but Threes!’s simplicity belies an endlessly gratifying and remarkably original game that rewards thoughtful strategy over frenzied swiping. With its lovingly crafted design, whimsical music, and unforgettable gameplay, Threes! is a delightful experience you’ll return to again and again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
